$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/GitHub.title: $:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/GitHub
$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/GitHub.caption: <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"><$list filter="[<lang>search:title[zh]]">太微中文社区插件源(~GitHub版)</$list><$list filter="[<lang>!search:title[zh]]">TiddlyWiki CPL(~GitHub Host)</$list></$list>
$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/GitHub.text:
<!-- lang变量就是当前语言 -->
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang">
<$list filter="[<lang>search:title[zh]]" variable="lang">

欢迎使用''【太微中文社区插件源】''！

本插件源是由[[太微(TiddlyWiki)中文社区|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]]维护的、致力于搜集网络上所有与 ~TiddlyWiki5 有关插件的、希望为中国以及全世界的太微用户提供一键安装、更新插件体验的公开插件源。

如果还不了解该如何使用太微和本插件源，欢迎阅读[[中文社区共建的太微（TiddlyWiki）教程|https://tw-cn.netlify.app]]里插件相关的部分。如上提到的插件源和教程皆为开源项目，你可以在 [[GitHub|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]] 中找到并参与贡献！如果乐意，可以通过QQ群等方式加入我们，详情请见如上提到的中文教程。

要添加这个插件库到你的 Wiki 中，只需鼠标拖动这个链接到你的 Wiki 里即可：<$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>{{!!caption}}</$link>

注意：本插件源版本为 ~GitHub Page 的版本，更新更快，但是可能需要科学上网手段。如果你在国内，而且不清楚什么是“科学上网”，请选用另一个经过 netlify.app 加速的[[版本|$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/Netlify]]，虽然更新有一定的延迟，但对国内用户更加友好。

@@color:red;''安装任何插件前，请记得备份你的Wiki，本插件源无法为插件造成的个人损失负责！''@@

</$list>

<$list filter="[<lang>!search:title[zh]]" variable="lang">

Welcome to the ''[TiddlyWiki Chinese Community Plugin Source]''!

This plugin source is maintained by the [[TiddlyWiki Chinese Community]] and is dedicated to collecting all TiddlyWiki5 related plugins on the web, hoping to provide a one-click installation and update plugin experience for TiddlyWiki users in China and around the world.

If you don't know how to use TiddlyWiki and this source, you are welcome to read the plugins related section in the [[TiddlyWiki Tutorials for Chinese Communities|https://tw-cn.netlify.app]]. As mentioned above, both the plugin source and the tutorial are open source projects, you can find them in [[GitHub|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]] and participate in contributing! If you like, you can join us through QQ groups and other means, see the Chinese tutorials mentioned above for details.

To add this plugin library to your Wiki, just drag this link with your mouse into your Wiki: <$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>{{!!caption}}</$link>

Note: The source version of this plugin is the ~GitHub Page version, which is faster to update, but may require scientific Internet access. If you are in China and are not sure what GFW is, please use another [[version|$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/Netlify]] that is accelerated by netlify.app, although there is a certain delay in updating, but it is more friendly to domestic users more friendly.

@@color:red;''Please remember to back up your Wiki before installing any plugins, this plugin source cannot be held responsible for personal losses caused by plugins!''@@

</$list>
</$list>

$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/Netlify.title: $:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/Netlify
$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/Netlify.caption: <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"><$list filter="[<lang>search:title[zh]]">太微中文社区插件源(大陆加速版)</$list><$list filter="[<lang>!search:title[zh]]">TiddlyWiki CPL(Netlify Host)</$list></$list>
$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/Netlify.text:
<!-- lang变量就是当前语言 -->
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang">
<$list filter="[<lang>search:title[zh]]" variable="lang">

欢迎使用''【太微中文社区插件源】''！

本插件源是由[[太微(TiddlyWiki)中文社区|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]]维护的、致力于搜集网络上所有与 ~TiddlyWiki5 有关插件的、希望为中国以及全世界的太微用户提供一键安装、更新插件体验的公开插件源。

如果还不了解该如何使用太微和本插件源，欢迎阅读[[中文社区共建的太微（TiddlyWiki）教程|https://tw-cn.netlify.app]]里插件相关的部分。如上提到的插件源和教程皆为开源项目，你可以在 [[GitHub|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]] 中找到并参与贡献！如果乐意，可以通过QQ群等方式加入我们，详情请见如上提到的中文教程。

要添加这个插件库到你的 Wiki 中，只需鼠标拖动这个链接到你的 Wiki 里即可：<$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>{{!!caption}}</$link>

注意：本插件源版本为经过 netlify.app 加速的版本，对国内用户更加友好，但是更新有一定的延迟。还提供另一版本，是直接使用 ~GitHub Page 服务器的版本，更新更快，但是可能需要科学上网手段。

@@color:red;''安装任何插件前，请记得备份你的Wiki，本插件源无法为插件造成的个人损失负责！''@@

</$list>

<$list filter="[<lang>!search:title[zh]]" variable="lang">

Welcome to the ''[TiddlyWiki Chinese Community Plugin Source]''!

This plugin source is maintained by the [[TiddlyWiki Chinese Community]] and is dedicated to collecting all TiddlyWiki5 related plugins on the web, hoping to provide a one-click installation and update plugin experience for TiddlyWiki users in China and around the world.

If you don't know how to use TiddlyWiki and this source, you are welcome to read the plugins related section in the [[TiddlyWiki Tutorials for Chinese Communities|https://tw-cn.netlify.app]]. As mentioned above, both the plugin source and the tutorial are open source projects, you can find them in [[GitHub|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]] and participate in contributing! If you like, you can join us through QQ groups and other means, see the Chinese tutorials mentioned above for details.

To add this plugin library to your Wiki, just drag this link with your mouse into your Wiki: <$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>{{!!caption}}</$link>

Note: The source version of this plugin is a version accelerated by netlify.app, which is more friendly to China mainland users, but there is a delay in updating. There is also another version that uses the GitHub Page server directly, which is faster to update, but may require technology to overturn the GFW.

@@color:red;''Please remember to back up your Wiki before installing any plugins, this plugin source cannot be held responsible for personal losses caused by plugins!''@@

</$list>
</$list>

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/install-plugin.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/install-plugin-request-model-template
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/install-plugin.subtitle: <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[请确认安装]else[Please Confirm to Install]] }}} />
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/install-plugin.text:
\import $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-size \define dependents-tree(json,checked-title,versions,sizes) <$list filter="[<__json__>jsonindexes[]]" variable="plugin">
<$let install-field={{{ [[cpl-plugin#install#]addsuffix] }}} version-field={{{ [[cpl-plugin#version#]addsuffix] }}}>
''<$text text=<>/>''  <$let v={{{ [<__checked-title__>get] }}}> <$macrocall $name="plugin-size" size={{{ [<__sizes__>jsonget,else[0]] }}} /> <$checkbox tiddler=<<__checked-title__>> field=<> checked="yes" unchecked="no" default="no"> <$text text={{{ [<__checked-title__>getmatch[yes]] :then[match[yes]then[即将安装:]else[Will be installed:]] :else[match[yes]then[不会安装]else[Will not be installed]] }}} /> <$list filter="[<__checked-title__>getmatch[yes]]" variable="t">   <$select tiddler=<<__checked-title__>> field=<>> <$list filter="[<__versions__>jsonget]" variable="version">
<$macrocall $name="dependents-tree" json={{{ [<__json__>jsonextract] }}} checked-title=<<__checked-title__>> versions=<<__versions__>> sizes=<<__sizes__>> />
\end <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="chinese"> <$let json={{{ [get[text]] }}}> <<< <$let title={{{ [jsonget[title]] }}}> ''<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[即将安装:]else[To be installed:]] }}}/>'' <$text text=<>/>    ''<$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[选择版本:]else[Select version:]] }}}/>'' <$select tiddler=<<requestTiddler>> field={{{ [[cpl-plugin#version#]addsuffix<title>] }}}> <$list filter="[<json>jsonget[versions],<title>]" variable="version"> <option value=<<version>>><$text text=<<version>>/></option> </$list> </$select> </$let> <<< <!-- 依赖树 --> <$list filter="[<json>jsonextract[tree]jsonindexes[]count[]compare:integer:gt[0]]" variable="t"> <$list filter="[<chinese>match[yes]]" variable="t"> 这个插件有一些依赖项，在安装插件之前，将会递归地安装这些插件，如果这些插件没有被成功安装，将会回滚所有安装动作。 你可以自行选择安装哪些插件并选择其版本。插件依赖树如下： </$list> <$list filter="[<chinese>!match[yes]]" variable="t"> This plugin has some dependencies that will be installed recursively before installing the plugin, and if these plugins are not installed successfully, all installation actions will be rolled back. It is up to you to choose which plugins to install and select their versions. The plugin dependency tree is as follows: </$list> </$list> <div style="margin-left:-1em;margin-right:6px;"> <$macrocall $name="dependents-tree" json={{{ [<json>jsonextract[tree]] }}} checked-title=<<requestTiddler>> versions={{{ [<json>jsonextract[versions]] }}} sizes={{{ [<json>jsonextract[sizes]] }}} /> </div> <hr/> <$list filter="[<chinese>match[yes]]" variable="t"> 注意：虽然 CPL 对安装失败有一定的回滚措施，但是无法避免因插件自身以及插件间相互作用所产生的潜在风险，包括但不限于 * 浏览器崩溃； * Wiki 系统受损或数据丢失; * 插件内含恶意脚本的执行造成隐私泄露或系统损坏； CPL [[接受恶意插件举报|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/TiddlyWiki-CPL/issues]]并将下架这类插件，但 CPL 不能保证其中收录的所有插件均安全可用。如您在安装后出现任何问题造成损失，CPL 无法负责。 @@background:#e91e3db0;color:white;padding:4px;''因此，在安装任何插件前，请备份您的Wiki！''@@ 即便如此，您依然要安装吗？ </$list> <$list filter="[<chinese>!match[yes]]" variable="t"> Note: Although the CPL has some rollback measures for failed installations, it is not immune to the potential risks arising from the plugins themselves and from interactions between plugins, including but not limited to * Browser crashes; * Damage to the Wiki system or loss of data; * Privacy leakage or system damage caused by the execution of malicious scripts contained in the plugin; CPL [[accepts reports of malicious plugins|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/TiddlyWiki-CPL/issues]] and will take down such plugins, but CPL cannot guarantee that all plugins included are safe and available. However, CPL cannot guarantee that all plugins are safe and available. CPL cannot be held responsible for any damage caused by any problem that occurs after you have installed the plugin. @@background:#e91e3db0;color:white;width:100%;padding:4px;''Therefore, please back up your wiki before installing any plugins!''@@ Even so, do you still want to install it? </$list> <$button class="tc-btn-big-green tc-primary-btn" message="tm-close-tiddler"> <$action-sendmessage $message="cpl-install-plugin" response=<<requestTiddler>> /> {{$:/core/images/done-button}} <$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[确认安装]else[Confirm to Install]] }}} /> </$button> </$let> </$list>

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/paged-plugin-l.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/paged-plugin-list
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/paged-plugin-l.text:
\define paged-plugin-list-control(class2:"") \whitespace trim <$list filter="[!match]">
<$list filter="[!match]"> <$button setTitle=<> setTo=<>>{{$:/core/images/left-arrow}}
<$text text={{{ [add[1]] }}}/> / <$text text={{{ [add[1]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[!match]"> <$button setTitle=<> setTo=<>>{{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
\end \define paged-plugin-list(filter,field,pageSize:"10",indexTitle:"$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugins-index",class1:"",class2:"") \whitespace trim <$let pageSize={{{ [<__pageSize__>min[1]] }}} indexTitle=<<__indexTitle__>> pageState=<> pluginCount={{{ $filter$ +[count[]] }}}> <$let pageMin="0" pageMax={{{ [divide<__pageSize__>ceil[]subtract[1]max[0]] }}}> <$let page={{{ [get[text]else] +[maxmin] }}}> <$let firstIndex={{{ [multiply<__pageSize__>] }}} nextPage={{{ [add[1]min] }}} lastPage={{{ [subtract[1]max] }}}> <>
<$list filter="$filter$ +[restfirst<__pageSize__>]" variable="plugin"> <$macrocall $name="plugin-list-item" json={{{ [{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugins-index}jsonextract] }}} field="$field$" class="cpl-plugin-info-box" />
<> \end

<$list filter="[<listItem>!match[$:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/tabs]]">
{{$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/about-banner}}
</$list>

	$name="tabs"
	state="$:/temp/CPL-Repo/panel-tab-state"
	tabsList="plugin-database uninstall-manager settings +[addprefix[$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/]]"
	default="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-database"
/>

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-databas.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-database
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-databas.caption: <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[插件数据库]else[Plugin Database]] }}} />
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-databas.text:
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="chinese"> <$button disabled={{{ [{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/getting-plugins-index}match[yes]else[no]] }}} class="tc-btn-big-green tc-primary-btn"> <$action-sendmessage $message="cpl-get-plugins-index" /> {{$:/core/images/download-button}} <$text text={{{ [[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugins-index]is[tiddler]] :then[match[yes]then[刷新数据库]else[Refresh Database]] :else[match[yes]then[加载数据库]else[Load Database]] }}} /> <$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[当前镜像]else[Current mirror]] }}}/>: <$text text={{{ [{$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/current-repo}!is[blank]else[https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/TiddlyWiki-CPL/library/all]] }}} /> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/getting-plugins-index]is[tiddler]!field:text[yes]]">
<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[出现了一些问题]else[Some errors occured]] }}}/>: <$text text={{!!text}}/> <$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[请尝试刷新]else[Please try refreshing]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/getting-plugins-index]is[tiddler]field:text[yes]]">
<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[加载中...]else[Loading...]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugins-index]is[tiddler]]" variable="ready"> <$macrocall $name="tabs" state="$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugin-database-tab-state" tabsList="home-gallery category-gallery tags-gallery update-manager +[addprefix[$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/]]" default="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/home-gallery" />

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-list-it.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-list-item
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-list-it.text:
\define tag-plain(text:"",icon:"",color:"",bg:"") \whitespace trim {{$icon$}}$text$ \end \define install-plugin-button(plugin,libraryVersion,installedVersion) \whitespace trim
<$let libraryVersion=<<__libraryVersion__>> installedVersion=<<__installedVersion__>> plugin=<<__plugin__>>> <$set name="reinstall-type" value={{{ [compare:version:eqthen[tc-reinstall]] [compare:version:gtthen[tc-reinstall-upgrade]] [compare:version:ltthen[tc-reinstall-downgrade]] }}}> <$button class={{{ [!is[blank]then] tc-btn-invisible tc-install-plugin +[join[ ]] }}} disabled={{{ [[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/instal-plugin-requesting]field:text[yes]else[]] [[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/installing-plugin]field:text[yes]else[]] +[unique[]match[yes]limit[1]else[no]] }}}> <$action-sendmessage $message="cpl-install-plugin-request" title=<> version=<>/> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/instal-plugin-requesting]field:plugin-title]">{{$:/core/images/timestamp-on}} <$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/instal-plugin-requesting]!field:plugin-title]"> {{$:/core/images/download-button}} <$list filter="[is[blank]]">{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Install/Caption}} <$list filter="[!is[blank]]"> <$list filter="[compare:version:gt]">{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Update/Caption}} <$list filter="[compare:version:lt]">{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Downgrade/Caption}} <$list filter="[compare:version:eq]">{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/Reinstall/Caption}}
\end \define plugin-list-item(json,field,show-suggestion:"yes",class:"") \whitespace trim \import $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-size <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="chinese">
<$let json=<<__json__>>> <$let title={{{ [jsonget[title]] }}} tags={{{ [jsonget[tags]] }}} icon={{{ [jsonget[icon]trim[]] }}} type={{{ [jsonget[type]else[plugin]] }}} name={{{ [jsonget[name]] ~[jsonget[title]split[/]last[1]] }}} description={{{ [jsonget[description]] }}} version={{{ [jsonget[version]] }}} category={{{ [jsonget[category]!is[blank]else[Unknown]] }}} installedVersion={{{ [jsonget[title]get[version]] }}} detailJsonTitle={{{ $:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugin-info [jsonget[title]] +[join[/]] }}} detailJsonStateTitle={{{ $:/temp/CPL-Repo/querying-plugin [jsonget[title]] +[join[/]] }}} > <$let popup-state={{{ $:/temp/CPL-Repo/popup-state [<__field__>] [] +[join[/]] }}}> <!-- 插件简介 --> <div class="tc-plugin-info"> <!-- 展开/收起按钮 --> <div class="tc-plugin-info-chunk tc-plugin-info-toggle"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<popup-state>> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" set=<<popup-state>> setTo="yes"> <$action-sendmessage $message="cpl-query-plugin" title=<<title>>/> {{$:/core/images/chevron-right}} </$button> </$reveal> <$reveal type="match" state=<<popup-state>> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown" set=<<popup-state>> setTo="no"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}} </$button> </$reveal> </div> <!-- 插件图标 --> <div class="tc-plugin-info-chunk tc-plugin-info-icon"> <$list filter="[<icon>!is[blank]]"> <img src=<<icon>>/> </$list> <$list filter="[<icon>is[blank]]"> <$transclude tiddler={{{ [[$:/core/images/plugin-generic-]addsuffix<type>] }}}/> </$list> </div> <!-- 标题，简介，版本，是否安装，标签分类 --> <div class="tc-plugin-info-chunk tc-plugin-info-description"> <h1><strong><$text text=<<name>>/></strong>: <$text text=<<description>>/></h1> <h2><$text text=<<title>>/></h2> <div><em><$text text=<<version>>/></em></div> <div style="padding-top:4px;"> <$macrocall $name="tag-plain" text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]] :then[<category>addprefix[$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/PluginCategory/]get[text]else[未分类]] :else[<category>] }}} icon="$:/core/images/folder" bg="#3f51b5" color="#fff" /> <$let bg={{{ [{$:/palette}getindex[tag-background]] }}} color={{{ [{$:/palette}getindex[foreground]] }}}> <$list filter="[enlist<tags>]" variable="tag"> <$macrocall $name="tag-plain" text=<<tag>> icon="$:/core/images/tag-button" bg=<<bg>> color=<<color>> /> </$list> </$let> </div> <$list filter="[<installedVersion>!is[blank]]" variable="t"> <div><em>{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/AlreadyInstalled/Hint}}</em></div> </$list> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/instal-plugin-requesting]is[tiddler]field:plugin-title<plugin>]"> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/instal-plugin-requesting}match[yes]]"> <span style="color:#3ed044;font-weight:800;"><$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[安装准备中...]else[Preparing installation...]] }}}/></span> </$list> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/instal-plugin-requesting}!match[yes]]"> <span style="color:#fd160e;font-weight:800;"><$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[出错: ]else[Error: ]addsuffix{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/instal-plugin-requesting}] }}}/></span> </$list> </$list> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/installing-plugin]is[tiddler]field:plugin-title<plugin>]"> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/installing-plugin}match[yes]]"> <span style="color:#3ed044;font-weight:800;"><$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[安装中...]else[Installing...]] }}}/></span> </$list> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/installing-plugin}!match[yes]]"> <span style="color:#fd160e;font-weight:800;"><$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[出错: ]else[Error: ]addsuffix{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/installing-plugin}] }}}/></span> </$list> </$list> </div> <!-- 安装按钮 --> <div class="tc-plugin-info-chunk tc-plugin-info-buttons"> <$macrocall $name="install-plugin-button" plugin=<<title>> libraryVersion=<<version>> installedVersion=<<installedVersion>> /> </div> </div> <!-- 详情 --> <$list filter="[<popup-state>field:text[yes]]"> <div class="tc-plugin-info-dropdown"> <!-- 错误提示 --> <$list filter="[<detailJsonStateTitle>is[tiddler]!field:text[yes]]"> <div style="background:#e91e3db0;color:white;padding:2px 6px;margin:3px 0;border-radius:2px;backdrop-filter:blur(4px);min-height:100px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;"> <$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[出现了一些问题]else[Some errors occured]] }}}/>: <$text text={{!!text}}/> <$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[请尝试刷新]else[Please try refreshing]] }}}/> </div> </$list> <!-- 加载中提示 --> <$list filter="[<detailJsonStateTitle>is[tiddler]field:text[yes]]"> <div style="background:#0005;color:#aaa;padding:2px 6px;margin:3px 0;border-radius:2px;backdrop-filter:blur(4px);min-height:100px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;"> <$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[加载中...]else[Loading...]] }}}/> </div> </$list> <!-- 插件详情 --> <$list filter="[<detailJsonStateTitle>!is[tiddler]]" veriable="t"> <$let json={{{ [<detailJsonTitle>get[text]] }}}> <$let title={{{ [<json>jsonget[title]] }}} readme={{{ [<json>jsonget[readme]] }}} parent-plugin={{{ [<json>jsonget[parent-plugin]] }}} dependents={{{ [<json>jsonget[dependents]] }}} latest={{{ [<json>jsonget[latest]] }}} author={{{ [<json>jsonget[author]] }}} suggestions={{{ [<json>jsonget[suggestions]] }}} > <!-- 依赖 --> <$list filter="[enlist<dependents>!is[blank]] [<parent-plugin>!is[blank]] +[limit[1]] ~[<title>!is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore"> <div style="background:#e91e3db0;color:white;padding:6px;" class="cpl-plugin-dependencies"> <$list filter="[<title>!is[tiddler]]">{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/NotInstalled/Hint}}</$list> <$list filter="[enlist<dependents>!is[blank]] [<parent-plugin>!is[blank]] +[limit[1]]" variable="ignore"> <div> {{$:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/AlsoRequires}} <$list filter="[enlist<dependents>] [<parent-plugin>] +[unique[]sort[name]!is[blank]]" variable="dependency"> <span style="border-radius:12px;padding:3px 8px;background:#1c3b40c2;font-size:12px;line-height:24px"><$text text=<<dependency>>/></span> </$list> </div> </$list> </div> </$list> <!-- 历史版本 --> <$list filter="[<json>jsonget[versions]count[]compare:integer:gt[1]]" variable="t"> <details class="more-versions-details"> <summary style="background:#246b84;padding:4px 10px;cursor:pointer;user-select:none;"> <$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[浏览其他历史版本]else[Browse older versions]] }}}/> </summary> <$list filter="[<json>jsonget[versions]reverse[]]" variable="version"> <div style="background:#1a4655;padding:4px 12px;display:flex;flex-direction:row;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;border-top:1px solid #15333c;"> <span> <<version>> <span style="opacity: 0.8;"> (<$macrocall $name="plugin-size" size={{{ [<json>jsonget[versions-size],<version>else[0]] }}} />)</span> <$list filter="[<latest>compare:version:eq<version>]"> <span class="cpl-latest-version-icon">{{$:/core/images/star-filled}}</span></$list> <$list filter="[<installedVersion>compare:version:eq<version>]"> <span class="cpl-installed-version-icon">{{$:/core/images/done-button}}</span></$list> </span> <div style="font-size:0.8em;line-height:1.2;"><$macrocall $name="install-plugin-button" plugin=<<title>> libraryVersion=<<version>> installedVersion=<<installedVersion>> /></div> </div> </$list> </details> </$list> <!-- 正文 --> <div class="tc-plugin-info-dropdown-body"> <$wikify name="rendered" text=<<readme>> output="html"><<rendered>></$wikify> </div> <!-- 推荐 --> <$list filter="[<__show-suggestion__>match[yes]]" variable="t"> <div style="padding:10px 20px;backdrop-filter:contrast(1.1);"> <!-- 作者的其他插件 --> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/authors}jsonget<author>count[]compare:integer:gt[1]]" variable="t"> <details> <summary style="padding:10px 0;"> <$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[作者的其他插件]else[Other plugins of Author]] }}} /> </summary> <div style="padding:6px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;"> <$list filter="[{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/authors}jsonget<author>] -[<title>]" variable="plugin"> <$macrocall $name="plugin-list-item" json={{{ [{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugins-index}jsonextract<plugin>] }}} field="$field$-author-suggestion" show-suggestion="no" class="cpl-plugin-info-box" /> </$list> </div> </details> </$list> <!-- 插件推荐 --> <$list filter="[enlist<suggestions>count[]compare:integer:gt[1]]" variable="t"> <details> <summary style="padding:10px 0;"> <$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[你可能感兴趣的插件]else[Plugins you may be interested in]] }}} /> </summary> <div style="padding:6px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;"> <$list filter="[enlist<suggestions>]" variable="plugin"> <$macrocall $name="plugin-list-item" json={{{ [{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugins-index}jsonextract<plugin>] }}} field="$field$-author-suggestion" show-suggestion="no" class="cpl-plugin-info-box" /> </$list> </div> </details> </$list> </div> </$list> </$let> </$let> </$list> </div> </$list> </$let> </$let> </$let> </div> </$list> \end

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-size.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-size
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-size.text:
\define plugin-size(size:"0")
<$list filter="[<__size__>compare:integer:gt[0]]" variable="size" emptyMessage="?">
<$let unit-step={{{ [<size>compare:integer:gteq[1048576]] :then[<size>compare:integer:gteq[1073741824]then[GiB#1073741824]else[MiB#1048576]] :else[<size>compare:integer:gteq[1024]then[KiB#1024]else[B#1]] }}}>
<$let unit={{{ [<unit-step>split[#]first[]] }}} step={{{ [<unit-step>split[#]last[]] }}}>
<$text text={{{ [<size>divide<step>fixed[2]] [<unit>] +[join[ ]] }}}/>
</$let>
</$let>
</$list>
\end

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/popup-readme.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/popup-readme
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/popup-readme.subtitle: <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[CPL 使用须知]else[Note to use CPL]] }}}/>
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/popup-readme.text:
{{$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/readme}}

<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="chinese">

<$checkbox
    tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/popup-readme-at-startup"
    field="text"
    checked={{$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/popup-readme-at-startup-threshold}}
    unchecked="0"
    default="0">
    <$text text={{{ [<chinese>match[yes]then[不再弹出该消息]else[No longer pops up this message]] }}}/>
</$checkbox>

<$list filter="[<chinese>match[yes]]">

CPL 的各项功能需要连接互联网、从插件数据库的静态资源网站下载 JSON 文件来实现。CPL 只会从网站上下载数据，不会将你的数据上传。

未来 CPL 可能添加插件投票和下载量统计功能，如添加这些功能，会先征得你的同意。你将来可以随时关闭这类功能。

你可以在这里查看 CPL 插件的逻辑代码: [[$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/core.js]]

CPL 当前尚未开启自动更新检测功能，如需开启，请手动前往设置页面启动：<$button>设置<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/settings" /></$button>

</$list>

<$list filter="[<chinese>match[no]]">

The functions of the CPL require an Internet connection to download JSON files from the plug-in database's static resource site for implementation. The CPL will only download data from the site, it will not upload your data.

In the future, CPL may add plugin polling and download statistics, and will ask for your permission to add these features. You can disable these features at any time in the future.

You can view the logic code of the CPL plugin here: [[$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/core.js]]

CPL has not yet enabled the automatic update detection function, if you want to enable it, please go to the settings page manually to start it: <$button>Settings<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/settings" /></$button>

</$list>

</$list>

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/readme.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/readme
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/readme.text:
{{$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/about-banner}}
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="chinese"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> > 好用到哭，装就完了! !! 欢迎使用 CPL! 使用 TW 这么久，你还在为四处寻觅好用的插件而发愁吗？还在为管理一大堆插件的更新、处理插件的依赖而苦恼吗？你还在为查找插件的用法而翻遍全网吗？你是否希望安装一个插件的某个历史版本，而非最新版本？ 如果你是插件的作者，你是否还在苦恼如何推广自己的插件，如何让用户及时获得最新的版本呢？ 你是否希望 TW 能像其他现代笔记软件一样，能够一键管理所有插件，能够更傻瓜化地查找和安装插件，甚至主动为你推广插件。是否希望 TW 能够帮助你自动保持插件的最新？ 这一切，在 CPL 得以实现！ --- CPL 是由[[太微(TiddlyWiki)中文社区|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]]维护的、致力于搜集网络上所有与 <$text text={{{ TiddlyWiki5 }}}/> 有关插件的、希望为中国以及全世界的太微用户提供一键安装、更新插件体验的插件聚合中心。 本插件有如下特点： * 聚合各种 TW 插件并保持最新当前 500+; * 在你的 Wiki 中搜索各种插件，提供关键词、分类和标签搜索; * 自动检查插件更新; * 安装插件时可自动递归安装依赖，并可以指定所有插件的安装版本; <$list filter="[match[no]]"> > Just install it! I think you need it. !! Welcome to CPL! After using TW for so long, are you still worried about looking around for good plugins? Are you still struggling to manage a bunch of plugin updates and deal with plugin dependencies? Are you still searching the web to find out how to use a plugin? Do you want to install some historical version of a plugin instead of the latest version? If you are a plugin author, do you still struggle with how to promote your plugin and how to keep users up to date with the latest version? Do you wish TW could manage all your plugins with one click like other modern note-taking software, make it more foolproof to find and install plugins, and even proactively promote plugins for you? Do you want TW to help you keep your plugins up-to-date automatically? It's all here at CPL! --- This plugin source is maintained by the [[TiddlyWiki Chinese Community|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]] and is dedicated to collecting all <$text text={{{ TiddlyWiki5 }}}/> related plugins on the web, hoping to provide a one-click installation and update plugin experience for TW users all around the world. This plugin has the following features: * Aggregate various TW plugins and keep them up-to-date with the current 500+;. * Search for various plugins in your Wiki, providing keyword, category and tag search;. * Check for plugin updates automatically; * Install plugins with automatic recursive installation of dependencies, and you can specify the installed version of all plugins;

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/settings.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/settings
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/settings.caption: <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[设置]else[Settings]] }}}/>
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/settings.subtitle: <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[CPL 设置]else[CPL Settings]] }}}/>
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/settings.text:
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="chinese">

<$list filter="[<chinese>match[yes]]">

在该页面内您可以对 CPL 插件的行为进行设定。

; CPL 数据库镜像入口 <$select tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/current-repo" field="text">
<$list filter="[{$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/repos}enlist-input[]]" variable="repo">
<option value=<<repo>>><$text text=<<repo>>/></option>
</$list>
</$select>

<<<
当 CPL 获取数据经常失败时，你可以尝试切换到其他镜像，目前国内推荐使用 netlify 镜像，

欢迎各位大佬部署国内镜像，详情请咨询QQ交流群或在[[GitHub Issue|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/TiddlyWiki-CPL/issues]]提问

你可以手动更改数据库镜像入口：[[$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/current-repo]]
<<<

; 自动更新检查间隔 <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/auto-update-intervals-minutes" tag="input" default="-1" /> (分钟/次)

<<<
自动更新检查会在 Wiki 刚打开时进行，并每隔指定间隔进行一次检查

显然自动检查需要联网，每次所消耗的流量很小，大概10KB。如果发现有插件可以更新会在右上角弹窗提醒。

当值小于等于0，则关闭自动更新，也包括刚打开 Wiki 的那一次。

关闭后可以手动在 [[$:/ControlPanel]] 的 [CPL] 中进行检查。
<<<

; 插件更新筛选器 <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/update-filter" tag="input" default="" />

<<<
插件更新是有选择的，你可以通过修改筛选器来排除一些插件。
<<<

</$list>

<$list filter="[<chinese>match[no]]">

In this page you can set the behavior of the CPL plugin.

; CPL Database Mirror Entry <$select tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/current-repo" field="text">
<$list filter="[{$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/repos}enlist-input[]]" variable="repo">
<option value=<<repo>>><$text text=<<repo>>/></option>
</$list>
</$select>

<<<
When the CPL fails to fetch the data often, you can try to switch to another mirror.

If you'd like to deploy your own mirrors, feel free to ask questions in the [[GitHub Issue|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/TiddlyWiki-CPL/issues]]!

You can manually change the database mirror entry: [[$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/current-repo]]
<<<

; Automatic update of check intervals <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/auto-update-intervals-minutes" tag="input" default="-1" /> (minute(s) per time)

<<<
The automatic update check is performed when the Wiki is first opened, and at specified intervals

Obviously auto-checking requires an internet connection and consumes very little traffic each time, about 10KB. If a plugin is found to be updatable, a pop-up window will alert you in the upper right corner.

When the value is less than or equal to 0, auto-update is turned off, also when the Wiki is just opened.

After closing it can be checked manually in [CPL] of [[$:/ControlPanel]].
<<<

; Plugin Update Filter <$edit-text tiddler="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/config/update-filter" tag="input" default="" />

<<<
Plugin updates are selective and you can exclude some plugins by modifying the filter.
<<<

</$list>

</$list>

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/style.css.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/style.css

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/tags-gallery.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/tags-gallery
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/tags-gallery.caption: <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[标签]else[Tags]] }}} />
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/tags-gallery.text:
\import $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-list-item \import $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-size \import $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/paged-plugin-list \define tag-plain(text:"",icon:"",color:"",bg:"") \whitespace trim {{$icon$}}$text$ \end \define tag-plain-removable(saveTiddler,saveField:"tags",text:"",icon:"",color:"",bg:"") \whitespace trim {{$icon$}}$text$ <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-remove-tag-button" style="background-color:$bg$;color:$color$;fill:$color$;"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<<__saveTiddler__>> $field=<<__saveField__>> $subfilter="-[<__text__>]"/>{{$:/core/images/close-button}} \end <$let bg={{{ [{$:/palette}getindex[tag-background]] }}} color={{{ [{$:/palette}getindex[foreground]] }}} saveTiddler="$:/temp/CPL-Repo/search-tag-input">
<$list filter="[get[text]enlist-input[]]" variable="tag"> <$macrocall $name="tag-plain-removable" text=<> icon="$:/core/images/tag-button" bg=<> color=<> saveTiddler=<> saveField="text" />
<$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler="$:/temp/CPL-Repo/add-search-tag-input" tag="input" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Add/Placeholder}} focusPopup="$:/temp/CPL-Repo/add-search-tag-popup" class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-popup-handle" tabindex=<> focus="yes" filterMinLength="2" configTiddlerFilter="[[$:/core/macros/tag-picker]]" /> <$reveal state="$:/temp/CPL-Repo/add-search-tag-popup" type="nomatch" text="" default="">
<$list filter="[{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/tags}jsonget[]search{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/add-search-tag-input}]" variable="tag"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tag="a" tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Tags/Add/Button/Hint}}> <$macrocall $name="tag-plain" text=<> icon="$:/core/images/tag-button" bg=<> color=<> /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="text" $subfilter="[]"/>
<$button class="tc-primary-btn tc-btn-big-green cpl-plugin-search-go" disabled={{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/searching-plugin}}> <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]] :then[{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/searching-plugin}match[yes]then[搜索中...]else[搜索]] :else[{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/searching-plugin}match[yes]then[Searching...]else[Search]] }}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="cpl-search-plugins" mode="tags" text={{{ [get[text]] }}} saveTo="$:/temp/CPL-Repo/searchplugin-tags/result" />
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/searching-plugin]is[tiddler]!field:text[yes]]">
<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[出现了一些问题]else[Some errors occured]] }}}/>: <$text text={{!!text}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/searchplugin-tags/result]is[tiddler]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="go"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]" variable="t"> <> <$list filter="[match[no]]" variable="t"> <>

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/uninstall-plug.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/uninstall-plugin-model-template
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/uninstall-plug.subtitle: <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[请确认卸载]else[Please Confirm to Uninstall]] }}} />
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/uninstall-plug.text:
\define checkShadow() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field=<> $subfilter="[]"/> \define uncheckShadow() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field=<> $subfilter="-[]"/> <$let chinese={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]] }}}> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> > 即将卸载 <> <$list filter="[!field:plugin-type[]search:parent-plugin] [!field:plugin-type[]search:dependent] +[limit[1]]" variable="t"> --- !! 注意：插件被依赖 该插件仍然被如下插件依赖，是否继续卸载？ <$list filter="[!field:plugin-type[]search:parent-plugin] [!field:plugin-type[]search:dependent] +[unique[]sort[title]]" variable="other-plugin"> : <> --- !! 注意：残留条目 该插件中，有一些条目已不是默认值(有一个同名的非影子条目)，因此这些条目在删除插件后仍将保留。这可能会为你的 Wiki 增添一些额外的垃圾条目，或者为下一次安装插件或升级插件带来困扰。所以在删除插件时，是否该同时清理这些条目？请选择要删除或者保留的条目，或者点击其标题来产看它的内容来决定。 在决定之后，点击下方的按钮，卸载插件并同时删除勾选的条目。 <$list filter="[match[no]]"> > To uninstall <> <$list filter="[!field:plugin-type[]search:parent-plugin] [!field:plugin-type[]search:dependent] +[limit[1]]" variable="t"> --- !! Note: Plugin is Dependent The plugin is still dependent on the following plugins, do you continue to uninstall? <$list filter="[!field:plugin-type[]search:parent-plugin] [!field:plugin-type[]search:dependent] +[unique[]sort[title]]" variable="other-plugin"> : <> --- !! Note: Left tiddlers The plugin has some entries that are no longer default (there is a non-shadow entry with the same name), so these entries will remain after removing the plugin. This may add some extra junk entries to your Wiki, or cause problems for the next time you install the plugin or upgrade it. So when deleting a plugin, should you clean up these entries at the same time? Please select the entry you want to delete or keep, or click on its title to see what it says to decide. After deciding, click the button below to uninstall the plugin and remove the checked entries at the same time. <$button class="tc-btn-big-green tc-primary-btn" message="tm-close-tiddler"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[确认卸载]else[Confirm to Uninstall]] }}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[get[text]enlist-input[]] []" /> <$let keep={{{ [match[yes]then[保留]else[Keep]] }}} nokeep={{{ [match[yes]then[删除]else[Delete]] }}}> <$let tiddler=<> field="text">
<$list filter="[get[text]jsonindexes[tiddlers]is[tiddler]]" variable="shadow" emptyMessage="<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[无]else[]] }}} />"> <$let is-keep={{{ [get[text]enlist-input[]matchlimit[1]then[no]else[yes]] }}}>
match[yes]then[#00ff2d1d]else[#fd004748]] [[;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;padding:4px 6px;border:1px solid #7774]] +[join[]] }}}> <> <$checkbox filter="[get[text]enlist-input[]]" checked=<> checkactions=<> uncheckactions=<>> ''<$text text={{{ [match[yes]thenelse] }}}/>''

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-body.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-body
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-body.subtitle: <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[更新列表]else[Update List]] }}}/>
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-body.text:
\import $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-list-item \import $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/plugin-size \import $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/paged-plugin-list <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="chinese"> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/update-plugins]is[tiddler]] [[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/plugins-index]is[tiddler]] +[count[]compare:integer:eq[2]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="ready"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <> <$list filter="[match[no]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/getting-plugins-index]is[tiddler]!field:text[yes]]">
<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[出现了一些问题]else[Some errors occured]] }}}/>: <$text text={{!!text}}/> <$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[请尝试刷新]else[Please try refreshing]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/updaing]is[tiddler]!field:text[yes]]">
<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[出现了一些问题]else[Some errors occured]] }}}/>: <$text text={{!!text}}/> <$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[请尝试刷新]else[Please try refreshing]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/getting-plugins-index]is[tiddler]field:text[yes]] [[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/updaing]is[tiddler]field:text[yes]] +[limit[1]]">
<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[加载中...]else[Loading...]] }}}/>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/getting-plugins-index]is[tiddler]field:text[yes]] [[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/updaing]is[tiddler]field:text[yes]] +[limit[1]]">
<$text text={{{ [match[yes]then[加载中...]else[Loading...]] }}}/>

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-manager.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-manager
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-manager.caption: <$text text={{{ [[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[更新]else[Updates]] }}} />
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-manager.text:
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="chinese">
<$button disabled={{{ [{$:/temp/CPL-Repo/getting-plugins-index}match[yes]else[no]] }}} class="tc-btn-big-green tc-primary-btn">
<$action-sendmessage $message="cpl-update-check" />
{{$:/core/images/refresh-button}}
 
<$text text={{{ [[$:/temp/CPL-Repo/update-plugins]is[tiddler]] :then[<chinese>match[yes]then[重新获取更新]else[Refetch CPL]] :else[<chinese>match[yes]then[获取更新]else[Fetch update]] }}} />
</$button>
</$list>

{{$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-body}}

$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-notify-.title: $:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-notify-template
$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-notify-.text:
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]search[zh]then[yes]else[no]]" variable="chinese">

<$list filter="[<chinese>match[yes]]">

!! CPL 更新提醒

您的 Wiki 中有 <<updateCount>> 款插件在 CPL 中有更新版本, 快来更新吧!

<$button>
    更新
    <$action-sendmessage $message="cpl-get-plugins-index" />
    <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-body" />
</$button>
<$button>
    设置
    <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/settings" />
</$button>

</$list>

<$list filter="[<chinese>!match[yes]]">

!! CPL Update Alert

There are <<updateCount>> plugins in your Wiki that have newer versions in CPL, so update them now!

<$button>
    Update
    <$action-sendmessage $message="cpl-get-plugins-index" />
    <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/update-body" />
</$button>
<$button>
    Settings
    <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/CPL-Repo/settings" />
</$button>

</$list>

</$list>
